tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE SupplyChainData (
 id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 product_name VARCHAR(255),
 supplier_name VARCHAR(255),
 supplier_location VARCHAR(255),
 carbon_footprint DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE supply_chain_optimization (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name STRING,
    supplier_name STRING,
    production_location STRING,
    carbon_footprint DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE sustainability_metrics (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    company_name STRING,
    sustainability_rating DECIMAL,
    energy_consumption DECIMAL,
    waste_reduction DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE Product (
    product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    category VARCHAR(100),
    price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    quantity INT
);

CREATE TABLE Supplier (
    supplier_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    region VARCHAR(50),
    contact_email VARCHAR(100),
    contact_phone VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE Shipment (
    shipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    supplier_id INT,
    shipment_date TIMESTAMP,
    quantity_sent INT,
    delivery_status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE suppliers (
    supplier_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    supplier_name STRING,
    contact_name STRING,
    email STRING,
    address STRING
);

CREATE TABLE products (
    product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name STRING,
    category STRING,
    price FLOAT,
    supplier_id INT REFERENCES suppliers(supplier_id)
);

CREATE TABLE orders (
    order_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT REFERENCES products(product_id),
    quantity INT,
    order_date DATE,
    delivery_date DATE
);
